item.title: Caverta - Home 1
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Book a Table

Come and SEE

We create delicious experiences

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs
Now booking

Private Dinners & Happy Hours

Behind the Scenes

The Team

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Find More

Testimonials

What Clients Say

[testimonials][/testimonials]Contact

Make a Reservation

Private Dining

The Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 18 guests and requires either a half night or full night buyout. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

Private Events

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

item.title: Caverta - Home 4
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero.

Book a Table

Since 1990

Life & Food

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero.

Visit Us

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

STARTERS

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
MAIN COURSE

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt

  • Spicy Pancetta$21.00

    Roasted Garlic, Brussels, Housemade Ricotta
SOUPS

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
DESSERTS

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs

  • Ice Cream Chocolate$12.00

    Different flavours: chocolate, vanilla, melon
Our Photos

The Gallery

[mt_gallery post_id="844" id="gallery-home"]Contact

Make a Reservation

Our restaurant space is located right in the heart of the city. Ius in paulo referrentur. Per te nibh iriure scripseritm.

item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Fine Dining

Fresh Ingredients

Sweet Dessert

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis.

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs
Now booking

Private Dinners & Happy Hours

Behind the Scenes

The Team

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. 1

Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts
2

Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za'atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
3

Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
4

Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs

item.content:encoded:
Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

item.title: Caverta - Reservation
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Reservations are available online 3 weeks before the date of the reservation.

We welcome parties of 1 – 20 guests in our main dining room.

Private Events

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs.

Open Hours

Monday - Sunday: 1PM - 10PM
Happy Hours: 4PM - 6PM

[contact-form-7 id="548" title="Reservation"]

We welcome parties of 1 – 20 guests in our main dining room.

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs.

Open Hours

Monday - Sunday: 1PM - 10PM
Happy Hours: 4PM - 6PM

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Book a Table

Come and SEE

We create delicious experiences

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs
Now booking

Private Dinners & Happy Hours

Behind the Scenes

The Team

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Find More

Testimonials

What Clients Say

[testimonials][/testimonials]Contact

Make a Reservation

Private Dining

The Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 18 guests and requires either a half night or full night buyout. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

Private Events

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

item.title: Menu 2 Cols
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
The ideal venue to host your event for any occasion, redefining the dining experience through the exquisite seasonal menu and a beautifully designed space.

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. We create delicious experiences

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Make a Reservation

Private Dining

The Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 18 guests and requires either a half night or full night buyout. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

Private Events

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

item.title: Header 3
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Book a Table

Come and See

We create delicious experiences

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs
Now booking

Private Dinners & Happy Hours

Behind the Scenes

The Team

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore.

Find More

Testimonials

What Clients Say

[testimonials][/testimonials]Contact

Make a Reservation

Private Dining

The Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 18 guests and requires either a half night or full night buyout. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

Private Events

Looking for an ideal venue? Look no further. Corporate dinners, special occasions, Chef’s Table, let us handle your needs. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

Private Dining

The Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 18 guests and requires either a half night or full night buyout. Reservations are available online 6 weeks before the date of the reservation.

item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome

Dining at Caverta

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero.

Book a Table

Since 1990

Life & Food

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. Quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero.

Visit Us

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

STARTERS

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
MAIN COURSE

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt

  • Spicy Pancetta$21.00

    Roasted Garlic, Brussels, Housemade Ricotta
SOUPS

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
DESSERTS

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs

  • Ice Cream Chocolate$12.00

    Different flavours: chocolate, vanilla, melon
Our Photos

The Gallery

[mt_gallery post_id="844" id="gallery-home"]Contact

Make a Reservation

Our restaurant space is located right in the heart of the city. Ius in paulo referrentur. Per te nibh iriure scripseritm.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis.

Discover

Menu a la Carte

Explore texture, color and of course the ultimate tastes with our menu of the season. All the ingredients are fresh and carefully selected by our chefs. Enjoy an extraordinary dinning experience.

Starters Main Course Soups Desserts Starters

  • Tomato Bruschetta$4.00

    Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Cheese

  • Avocado & Mango Salsa$5.00

    Avocado, Mango, Tomatoes

  • Marinated Grilled Shrimp$7.00

    Fresh Shrimp, Oive Oil, Tomato Sauce

  • Baked Potato Skins$9.00

    Potatoes, Oil, Garlic

  • Maitake Mushroom$10.00

    Whipped Miso, Yaki Sauce, Sesame

  • Lobster Picante$12.00

    Grilled Corn Elote, Queso Cotija, Chili

  • Jambon Iberico$10.00

    Smoked Tomato Aioli, Idizabal Cheese, Spiced Pine Nuts

  • Garlic Baked Cheese$12.00

    Finnish Squeaky Cheese, Eggplant Conserva, Black Pepper
Main Course

  • Braised Pork Chops$21.00

    4 bone-in pork chops, olive oil, garlic, onion

  • Coconut Fried Chicken $19.00

    8 chicken pieces, coconut milk, oil

  • Chicken with Garlic & Tomatoes $15.00

    Chicken, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, dry white wine

  • Prime Rib$25.00

    Rib, rosemary, black pepper, red wine

  • Sriracha Beef Skewers$18.00

    Beef, garlic, sesame oil, vinegar

  • Crispy Tuna Fregola$22.00

    Fregola, Baby Arugula Roasted, Green Olives, Pine Nuts

  • Charred Lamb Ribs$20.00

    Za’atar, Turkish BBQ, Sesame Yoghurt
Soups

  • Terrific Turkey Chili$10.00

    Turkey, oregano, tomato paste, peppers

  • Cream of Asparagus Soup$12.00

    Asparagus, potato, celery, onion, pepper

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice Soup$9.00

    Cooked chicken, salt, butter, heavy cream

  • Italian Sausage Tortellini$8.00

    Cheese tortellini, sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Italian Sausage Soup$10.00

    Italian sausage, garlic, carrots, zucchini

  • Ham and Potato Soup$11.00

    Potatoes, ham, celery, onion, milk
Desserts

  • Summer Berry and Coconut Tart$10.00

    Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, graham cracker

  • Double Chocolate Cupcakes$12.00

    Chocolate, eggs, vanilla, milk

  • Pumpkin Cookies Cream Cheese$10.00

    Pumpkin, sugar, butter, eggs
Now booking

Private Dinners & Happy Hours

Behind the Scenes

The Team

For a truly memorable dining experience, cuisine and atmosphere are paired as thoughtfully as food and wine. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco. item.title: Reservation OpenTable
item.dc:creator: wpdemadmin
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a fine dining restaurant? Reservations are available online 3 weeks before the date of the reservation.

We welcome parties of 1 – 20 guests in our main dining room.

[match_opentable id="347401" btn_txt="Find a Table" people_txt="How many" date_txt="When" time_txt="What time"]

item.title: Contact Form
